name: Consero
description: Consero was founded in early 2006 with the goal of providing expertise to growth stage companies with a superior alternative to building and maintaining an in-house finance function. Since then, Consero has grown to be recognized as the #1 provider in the industry by independent publications like the Black Book of Outsourcing as well as one of the fastest growing companies in industry by 2010 Inc500 Magazine and again in 2013 with recognition on the Inc5000 list.
